rows.label: bf03040100_0010
rows.name:
Hellooo! Umon! Umon?!
Where is Umon?

rows.label: bf03040100_0020
rows.name:
Who is that?
Who is noisy while I do my work?

rows.label: bf03040100_0030
rows.name: Tora! This big surprise!

rows.label: bf03040100_0040
rows.name: Long time no see, Unclepon!

rows.label: bf03040100_0050
rows.name:
Yes! Long time!
About one whole year?

rows.label: bf03040100_0060
rows.name: Yes, about that!

rows.label: bf03040100_0070
rows.name: You became very big in one year, Tora!

rows.label: bf03040100_0080
rows.name: Yes, Tora not littlepon anymore.

rows.label: bf03040100_0090
rows.name: And Tora have lots of sidekicks!

rows.label: bf03040100_0100
rows.name:
Boss and friends are not Tora's sidekicks!
They are real friends, Umon!

rows.label: bf03040100_0110
rows.name: Boss! Meet Unclepon Umon!

rows.label: bf03040100_0120
rows.name:
He did great research with Grampypon!
He is great builder of ships!

rows.label: bf03040100_0130
rows.name: Hello!

rows.label: bf03040100_0140
rows.name: Greetings.

rows.label: bf03040100_0150
rows.name: At your service.

rows.label: bf03040100_0160
rows.name:
I see! Tora's friends!
Tora has lots of friends. Very good!

rows.label: bf03040100_0170
rows.name: Tora has become fine biggipon.

rows.label: bf03040100_0180
rows.name: Hehehe!

rows.label: bf03040100_0190
rows.name: Well, Tora. Did you need Umon's help for something?

rows.label: bf03040100_0200
rows.name:
Well, we wanted to borrow a ship.
From Unclepon Umon!

rows.label: bf03040100_0210
rows.name:
A ship? But there are lots of ships in
Torigo!

rows.label: bf03040100_0220
rows.name: Why hike all the way to bum-bum to see me?

rows.label: bf03040100_0230
rows.name: Oh...erm...well...

rows.label: bf03040100_0240
rows.name: Tora run out of gold, hmmm?

rows.label: bf03040100_0250
rows.name:
Umh... Yes! Tora spend all the gold
on artificial Blade!

rows.label: bf03040100_0260
rows.name:
Tora flat broke, like penniless
pancake.

rows.label: bf03040100_0270
rows.name:
I wanted to go on a little boaty-jaunt to, ah...
nearby place. But no money to go on boat!

rows.label: bf03040100_0280
rows.name:
Hmmph. I hope Tora can keep track of
all of these fibs he's telling...

rows.label: bf03040100_0290
rows.name: There's no other option.

rows.label: bf03040100_0300
rows.name: We can hardly tell him what happened in Torigo, can we?

rows.label: bf03040100_0310
rows.name: Yeah, I guess you're right...

rows.label: bf03040100_0320
rows.name: So long as we get a boat out of this...

rows.label: bf03040100_0330
rows.name:
Artificial Blade, eh? Was this what
Tora's Grampypon was working on?

rows.label: bf03040100_0340
rows.name:
My name is Hana.
Pleased to meet Unclepon.

rows.label: bf03040100_0350
rows.name: Yes! This it!

rows.label: bf03040100_0360
rows.name:
This pretty mighty!
Tora take after Grampypon indeed!

rows.label: bf03040100_0370
rows.name:
Oooh, well...
How can I refuse Tora now?

rows.label: bf03040100_0380
rows.name: Tora may use Umon's ship but there is problem.

rows.label: bf03040100_0390
rows.name: Wh-what is problem?

rows.label: bf03040100_0400
rows.name: You see, ship not quite ready just yet.

rows.label: bf03040100_0410
rows.name:
Not much left to do! But work
stop, because no building parts.

rows.label: bf03040100_0420
rows.name: That's the only problem?

rows.label: bf03040100_0430
rows.name:
Correct! But that is big problem.
Big like sea or mountain.

rows.label: bf03040100_0440
rows.name:
You mean, all you need is some parts,
then you can finish the ship?

rows.label: bf03040100_0450
rows.name: It just as you say, friend.

rows.label: bf03040100_0460
rows.name: So, if we go and find the parts, then you'll...

rows.label: bf03040100_0470
rows.name:
Of course! I make ship ready.
Then you borrow!

rows.label: bf03040100_0480
rows.name:
Thank you!
Come on everyone, let's go!

rows.label: bf03040100_0490
rows.name:
Yay!
Let's go find ship ingredients!
